name: Epsilla
headline: All-in-one platform to create AI agents with your private knowledge
description: Epsilla is an all-in-one platform for building AI agents powered by your private data and knowledge. Easy to use for domain professionals, deeply customizable for AI experts, and fully equipped for enterprise customers with security, scalability, and integration.

founders.name: Richard Song, Founder
founders.description: Richard Song is the Co-Founder and CEO of Epsilla. Before Epsilla, Richard was the Senior Director of Cloud Engineering at TigerGraph, led the team to build the DBaaS offering of TigerGraph's graph analytics platform. In addition to this, Richard led the team to build a suite of tools designed to empower developers, data scientists, and DevOps teams, enabling them to extract value from TigerGraph.

founders.name: Ricki Qin, Founder
founders.description: Ricki Qin is the Co-Founder of Epsilla. Before Epsilla, Ricki was the Engineering Manager in Cloud team at TigerGraph, led the team to build the Cloud Portal. Ricki has 5 years experience in the database industry, helped to build a suite of tools designed to empower developers, data scientists, and DevOps teams.

founders.name: Eric Yang, Founder
founders.description: Eric is the Co-Founder and CTO of Epsilla. Before Epsilla, Eric was the Architect of Tigergraph Cloud. Eric has 10+ years experience in Cloud Infrastructure with deep insight of System Relability and Scalability.

# Ship Production-Ready AI Agents on Day 1
###### An all-in-one platform to create vertical LLM agents powered by your private data and knowledge.
Get Started
[![Epsilla - No Code RAG-as-a-Service for GenAI Builders | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/featured.svg?post_id=484586&theme=light)](https://www.epsilla.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/epsilla?embed=true&utm_source=badge-featured&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-epsilla>)[![Epsilla - All-in-one platform to create AI agents with your knowledge | Product Hunt](https://api.producthunt.com/widgets/embed-image/v1/top-post-badge.svg?post_id=484586&theme=light&period=daily)](https://www.epsilla.com/<https:/www.producthunt.com/posts/epsilla?embed=true&utm_source=badge-top-post-badge&utm_medium=badge&utm_souce=badge-epsilla>)[![Launch YC: Epsilla — Ship production-ready AI agents on day 1](https://www.ycombinator.com/launches/Ls3-epsilla-ship-production-ready-ai-agents-on-day-1/upvote_embed.svg)](https://www.epsilla.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/launches/Ls3-epsilla-ship-production-ready-ai-agents-on-day-1>)
![](https://www.epsilla.com/main-bg.png)
Selected Apps
#### Try GenAI Agents built by our community![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png)
![Chatbot](https://www.epsilla.com/selected-apps/research-paper-on-rag.png)
##### Research Papers on RAG
Find reliable and accurate answers to your questions about Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), with sources linked to the papers supporting the results.
1242
Try it now
![Chatbot](https://www.epsilla.com/selected-apps/ai-literacy-researchbot.png)
##### AI Literacy ResearchBot
Hello, I am your AI Literacy research assistant. How can I help you today?
104
Try it now
![Chatbot](https://www.epsilla.com/selected-apps/mike-dillenger.png)
##### Posts by Mike Dillenger
Ask me anything about Mike Dillenger's LinkedIn posts on Knowledge Graphs and LLMs (72 posts, last update: 2024/07/06). How can I help you today?
802
Try it now
![Chatbot](https://www.epsilla.com/selected-apps/swarmstack.png)
##### SwarmStack
An AI agent that guides you from product planning to commercialization. It provides tailored recommendations with innovative and proven solutions, helping you define goals, create step-by-step plans, and take your idea to market efficiently.
3024
Try it now
![Chatbot](https://www.epsilla.com/selected-apps/2023-income-tax.png)

345
Try it now

##### Frontier Research Library
Frontier Research Library is a fictionary library committed to providing cutting-edge resources and technologies to support groundbreaking research across all disciplines. We demo Chatbot and Smart Search integrations to the library website.
769
Try it now
Why Choosing Epsilla
#### Everything you need![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png) to build your LLM product
All the data, integrations, and RAG tooling in one stack that just works.
##### One-Stop Platform
Manages the entire lifecycle of LLM application development, testing, deployment, and operation without the need to piece together multiple systems. Achieving the lowest total cost of ownership (TCO).
Learn More
##### Faster, Better and Cheaper Vector Search Engine
Featuring the vector database and search engine that outperforms all other leading vendors with 10X lower query latency, 5X higher query throughput, and 3X lower cost.
Learn More
##### AI Native Data and Knowledge Management
An innovative data and knowledge foundation that efficiently manages large-scale, multi-modality unstructured and structured data. Never have to worry about outdated information.
Learn More
##### Advanced RAG as Building Blocks
Plug and play with state-of-the-art advanced, modular, agentic RAG and GraphRAG techniques without writing plumbing code.
##### Fast Iteration with Confidence
With CI/CD-style evaluations, you can confidently make configuration changes to your AI applications without worrying about regressions. Accelerate your iterations and move to production in days, not months.
##### Enterprise Ready Security
Fine-grained, role-based, and privilege-based access control. Plug into any open source and self-hosted LLMs. Supports private cloud and on-premises deployment.
Use Cases
#### How customers use Epsilla![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png)
Check some of the use cases in vertical industries.
##### Personal AI Assistant
Epsilla empowers citizen GenAI builders create AI assistants and agents, and help you and your customers research topics of interest, answer questions, and automate your day to day workflows.
Learn More
##### AI Financial Analyst
Financial firms are facing high costs and inefficiencies in manual data retrieval and analysis from financial reports and news. Epsilla helps with automating these processes, reducing costs by 90% and increasing efficiency by 10 times.
Learn More
##### AI Lawyer Assistant
Epsilla enables legal firms to search, summarize and analyze legal documents from both public and private court databases, significantly reducing the time and cost of legal research by up to 80%.
Learn More
##### AI Customer Support
Epsilla helps customer success teams to automate responses to customer questions, provide instant answers, and escalate complex issues to human agents, reducing response time and increasing customer satisfaction.
Learn More
##### Boost Content Engagement
Epsilla helps publishers and content providers to enhance content discoverability and engagement, driving more traffic. By leveraging advanced AI for semantic search and summarization, publishers can overcome information overload and deliver quick, relevant content to their audience.
Learn More
##### AI Recruiting
Epsilla enables recruiting platforms and HR departments to efficiently screen and shortlist candidates by analyzing resumes and job descriptions with semantic matching workflows, saving 70% of time and resources.
Learn More
##### AI Tutor and Study Buddy
Epsilla helps students and educators to search, summarize and learn educational materials, providing a personalized learning path and emmersive learning experience.
Learn More
#### Trusted![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png) by
Thousands of companies and GenAI builders.

FAQ
#### Frequently asked questions![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png)
Browse through these FAQs to find answers to commonly asked questions.
### 
###### Who can use Epsilla?
Epsilla can be used by enterprise GenAI developers, small businesses, vertical industry startups, and citizen GenAI builders to build production-ready LLM applications connected with private or public data, offering high-quality, customizable AI solutions – and hopefully you too!
### 
###### Can I try Epsilla for Free?
Yes, Epsilla provides a free tier with limited data and LLM workflow capacity (please refer to our pricing plan information above for details), perfect for building a small prototype. Once you are satisfied with the prototype, you can upgrade to a paid plan to access more features and expanded capacity.
### 
###### What data sources can I connect to Epsilla? Is there a limit to the size of the data?
You can connect to a wide variety of data sources, including locally uploaded files, websites, Google Drive, Notion, SharePoint, cloud storage, and many more. Epsilla's data infrastructure supports horizontal scaling with no limit on the size of the data you can connect to. You only pay for the amount of data you store and process.
### 
###### What LLMs and embedding models are available in Epsilla?
Epsilla supports a wide range of LLMs from providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, MistralAI, Cohere, and Google, as well as embedding models from OpenAI, MistralAI, JinaAI, VoyageAI, and others. If you need to integrate a specific model not currently available on Epsilla, please contact us, and we will gladly assist with a custom integration.
### 
###### Do you offer customization of Epsilla for specific use cases?
Yes, as part of our Enterprise Tier, we offer consulting and customization services to help you build and deploy custom AI applications tailored to your specific use case. Please contact us for more information.
## Ready to Get Started?

#### How customers use Epsilla![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png)
Check some of the use cases in vertical industries.
##### Personal AI Assistant
Epsilla empowers citizen GenAI builders create AI assistants and agents, and help you and your customers research topics of interest, answer questions, and automate your day to day workflows.
Learn More
##### AI Financial Analyst
Financial firms are facing high costs and inefficiencies in manual data retrieval and analysis from financial reports and news. Epsilla helps with automating these processes, reducing costs by 90% and increasing efficiency by 10 times.
Learn More
##### AI Lawyer Assistant
Epsilla enables legal firms to search, summarize and analyze legal documents from both public and private court databases, significantly reducing the time and cost of legal research by up to 80%.
Learn More
##### AI Customer Support
Epsilla helps customer success teams to automate responses to customer questions, provide instant answers, and escalate complex issues to human agents, reducing response time and increasing customer satisfaction.
Learn More
##### Boost Content Engagement
Epsilla helps publishers and content providers to enhance content discoverability and engagement, driving more traffic. By leveraging advanced AI for semantic search and summarization, publishers can overcome information overload and deliver quick, relevant content to their audience.
Learn More
##### AI Recruiting
Epsilla enables recruiting platforms and HR departments to efficiently screen and shortlist candidates by analyzing resumes and job descriptions with semantic matching workflows, saving 70% of time and resources.
Learn More
##### AI Tutor and Study Buddy
Epsilla helps students and educators to search, summarize and learn educational materials, providing a personalized learning path and emmersive learning experience.
Learn More
#### Trusted![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png) by
Thousands of companies and GenAI builders.

FAQ
#### Frequently asked questions![](https://www.epsilla.com/section-title-icon.png)
Browse through these FAQs to find answers to commonly asked questions.
### 
###### Who can use Epsilla?
Epsilla can be used by enterprise GenAI developers, small businesses, vertical industry startups, and citizen GenAI builders to build production-ready LLM applications connected with private or public data, offering high-quality, customizable AI solutions – and hopefully you too!
### 
###### Can I try Epsilla for Free?
Yes, Epsilla provides a free tier with limited data and LLM workflow capacity (please refer to our pricing plan information above for details), perfect for building a small prototype. Once you are satisfied with the prototype, you can upgrade to a paid plan to access more features and expanded capacity.
### 
###### What data sources can I connect to Epsilla? Is there a limit to the size of the data?
You can connect to a wide variety of data sources, including locally uploaded files, websites, Google Drive, Notion, SharePoint, cloud storage, and many more. Epsilla's data infrastructure supports horizontal scaling with no limit on the size of the data you can connect to. You only pay for the amount of data you store and process.
### 
###### What LLMs and embedding models are available in Epsilla?
Epsilla supports a wide range of LLMs from providers like OpenAI, Anthropic, MistralAI, Cohere, and Google, as well as embedding models from OpenAI, MistralAI, JinaAI, VoyageAI, and others. If you need to integrate a specific model not currently available on Epsilla, please contact us, and we will gladly assist with a custom integration.
### 
###### Do you offer customization of Epsilla for specific use cases?
Yes, as part of our Enterprise Tier, we offer consulting and customization services to help you build and deploy custom AI applications tailored to your specific use case. Please contact us for more information.

generated_description:
Epsilla is a spirited newcomer in the AI landscape, launched in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S23. Based in Jersey City, NJ, the startup is built by a small but mighty team of three, focusing on providing an all-in-one platform that empowers businesses and individuals to create AI agents tailored to their private knowledge.

At its core, Epsilla offers a robust platform that combines the power of advanced artificial intelligence with the security and customization needed for various users—from domain professionals to enterprise-level customers. Think of it as a toolkit for building AI agents using your own data, leveraging the latest in retrieval-augmented generation (RAG) and other cutting-edge AI methodologies. What sets Epsilla apart is its user-friendliness for beginners and rich customization options for experienced AI developers.

The company's mission is clear: make it seamless to deploy production-ready AI agents right from day one. This isn’t just about chatbots; they provide solutions that extend into various use cases like personal AI assistants, financial analytics, legal research, and customer support—essentially streamlining operations and enhancing efficiency across industries.

Epsilla is marked by distinctive features such as:

- **One-Stop Platform**: It encompasses the full lifecycle from development to deployment, helping users avoid the pitfalls of disparate systems.
- **Rapid Development**: Support for a CI/CD-style evaluation process ensures that iteration is quick, allowing for changes without prolonged regressions.
- **Enterprise Security**: Focused on fine-grained, role-based access control, ensuring that sensitive data remains protected.

Pricing plans are designed to cater to different needs, featuring a free tier and tiers that scale up for teams needing more capacity and support, ultimately leading to customized enterprise offerings.

Diana Hu serves as the Group Partner, and backers include notable venture capital firms, enhancing Epsilla's credibility and potential in the competitive AI industry.

For those interested in delving into the world of AI agent development driven by personal and private knowledge, Epsilla offers an engaging path to explore, whether you're an eager novice or an established expert. With Epsilla, the future looks promising for anyone looking to harness the power of AI. You can check them out more thoroughly at [Epsilla's website](https://www.epsilla.com/).
